title: Making Mosaics
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 1,155 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 950L
description: The art of mosaics has been around for many centuries. This book will tell you everything you need to know--from tools and supplies to sealing your final product--to create your own beautiful mosaic creations.
highFrequencyWords: Art Nouveau, cure, floats, mosaic, palette knife, pH balance, pictorial realism, polymer, trowels
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Multiple Meaning Words                : Identify and understand multiple-meaning words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
